metadata.description: PhD/Postdoc optimized career timeline progression data for 31 career paths - main progression and pivot opportunities
metadata.note: Salary ranges based on 2025 US market data (major tech hubs: SF Bay Area, Seattle, NYC) with PhD premium applied. Timeline data reflects PhD-accelerated progression.
changeLog: Repositioned PhD entry points to realistic mid/senior levels
Applied 15-25% PhD salary premiums across all levels
Reduced progression timelines by 25-30% for PhD advantages
Extended pivot opportunities to 3-4 stage career arcs
Added 4 new high-value PhD careers (AI/ML, DevOps, Cybersecurity, Digital Health)
Corrected inflated salary ranges per market feedback
Added PhD-specific transition fields and academic bridge roles
